summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of L.I.D. No. 6689 for the improvement of S. Webster St. from 3rd Ave. S. to 5th Ave. S.; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving the same with three inches of asphaltic concrete on the existing street surface; under Ordinance No. 106576, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a local improvement fund.
